New Records: India beat West Indies by 9 wickets in the fourth T20I to level the series 2-2
Key Match Events: Yashasvi Jaiswal and Shubman Gill shared a 165-run opening partnership to set up the win
Arshdeep Singh and Kuldeep Yadav took key wickets for India
Pre-Game Insights: West Indies won the toss and opted to bat first
captains Hardik Pandya and Rovman Powell discussed their strategies
Post-Match Reflections: Players and analysts highlighted the importance of the win for India's World Cup preparations
Shubman Gill and Yashasvi Jaiswal's performances were praised
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Central Broward Regional Park, Lauderhill, Florida
West Indies' batting lineup included Shimron Hetmyer and Shai Hope
